show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: International Relations and American Awareness
content: Charlene Spretnak talks with Richard Falk, author of 20 books on international law and relations and currently UN... <!--more--> Special Rapporteur on Occupied Palestine, about American lack of awareness of how peoples around the world experience our foreign policy and corporate behavior; Syria and the Israel/Palestine situations; poem by Hafiz
